Often, and especially when trying to fill a critical position, manager utilize their personal network to find the right person. Please review the section \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/GDOKB/Build+Your+EPAM+Network\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Build You EPAM Network\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", if you haven't already. However, there is a drawback to utilizing your personal network: it doesn't scale. If you have to staff people on a large scale, we recommend you \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1674534193#OKR1RecommendationsforComplexEngagements-UseEPAMTools\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use EPAM Tools\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", as these options to finding people scale much better.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you do not have someone within your direct network with the needed experience, try these out:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask Your Boss or Senior Co-worker\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - Senior leadership is there to help and often they know more people than you. Ask your boss if he has any leads or can recommend someone.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask Your Delivery Partner\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - Delivery Partners specialize in delivery from a specific location or set of locations. They are paired with business units and support all delivery functions including helping you find the right person. Check out our section on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/GDOKB/Getting+Help+When+Needed#GettingHelpWhenNeeded-DeliveryPartners\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Partners\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to find out who your delivery partners are.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask Around The Office\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - You never know what people will say. Doesn't hurt to ask.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask Your Co-workers to Ask People Within Their Personal Network\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - The right person may be just one connection further than your immediate network. Ask your co-workers if they will spread the word.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask the RM of a Proposed Candidate\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - The initial candidate may not be the right fit, so ask the candidate's Resource Manager if there is anyone they know of that may be a better fit.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://networks.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Networks.epam.com\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - The point of this tool is to help you find and network with people without the need for instruction.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use EPAM Tools\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://staffing.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Desk\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - This is the BEST tool for finding people at scale. Networking may helping find specific needs, but it will never scale like our Staffing Desk does. If you need to fill a team, let the EPAM Staffing Machine work for you. You can learn more about how to use Staffing Desk here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSTAFPUB/Staffing+Desk+User+Guide\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Desk User Guide - EPAM Staffing Desk - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PROTIP: Fill out position descriptions and talk to the staffing coordinators to get the most out of the Staffing Desk tool.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/people/search\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People in Telescope\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - Telescope is a powerful internal EPAM search tool. This search tool can allow you to find people based on skills, previous projects, and a plethora of other facets. Some managers have been able to staff their entire project via Telescope. Check out the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/E3S/Welcome\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Telescope KB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn how to utilize the powerful tool.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://radar.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Radar\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - Another very powerful tool. Staffing Radar allows you to customize filters across almost all meta data we have on our people and positions. There is a bit of a learning curve with this tool, but once you understand how to use it, it can be a great advantage. Learn more about how to use Staffing Radar here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Staffing+Radar\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Radar - EPAM WPM - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://experts.epam.com/welcome\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Experts\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – If the expertise you are looking for requires a specific certification, then check out \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://experts.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Experts.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".
